name: Send Email on SingleCell LIB QC PASS
script:
if doc.qc_status == "PASS" and doc.customer: customer = frappe.get_doc("NGS Customer", doc.customer) lib_id = f"{doc.singlecell_library_construction_id or doc.name}" sample_link_html = "" if doc.sample_info: sample_link = frappe.utils.get_url_to_form("NGS Sample Info", doc.sample_info) sample_link_html = f"""

You can view the details of your sample information here:
View Sample Info ({doc.sample_info})

""" if customer.email: subject = f"Your Library QC Status: PASS — {lib_id}" message = f"""

QC Status: PASS

Dear {customer.full_name or 'Customer'},

We are pleased to inform you that your library construction {lib_id} has successfully passed the quality control (QC) process.

{sample_link_html}

If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us.

Best regards,
Your Athenomics Lab Team

""" frappe.sendmail( recipients=[customer.email], subject=subject, message=message, delayed=False, is_html=True )

name: Create User on NGS Customer Submit
script:
user_name, password = frappe.get_attr("ngs_hub.api.user_utils.create_ngs_customer_user")(doc.email, doc.full_name) if user_name: login_url = frappe.utils.get_url("/login") message = f"""

Welcome to NGS Hub

Dear {doc.full_name or 'Customer'},

Your NGS Hub account has been successfully created. You can now log in using the following credentials:

  • Login URL: {login_url}
  • Email: {doc.email}
  • Password: {password}

Please change your password after logging in for the first time.

Best regards,
NGS Hub Team

""" # 发送邮件 frappe.sendmail( recipients=[doc.email], subject="Your Athenomics Account Has Been Created", message=message, is_html=True, delayed=False )
